name: hypersensitize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone extremely sensitive to (= easily influenced, changed, or damaged by) something: A previous painful experience might hypersensitize some people, making them more likely to perceive pain. The test is occasionally for identification of substances to which a dog has become hyper-sensitised.
More examplesFewer examplesThe condition results in a hypersensitized larynx, with the result that problems which ordinarily would not cause a cough in normal patients will now cause a persistent cough.This ingredient in chilli peppers is a prohibited substance in horseracing because of its pain-relieving and hypersensitizing properties.The main character is almost paralyzed by his hypersensitized feelings.
